message: Hello, welcome to SofaNest.  My name is Chris.  How can I help you?

Hi, I need to make a complaint about the delivery person who brought my sofa today. They were really unprofessional and left without even setting it up properly. It's all marked too. The deliverer just shrugged.

I’m so sorry to hear about this experience with our delivery service, and I completely understand how upsetting it must have been. Let me look into this and ensure it’s addressed immediately. Before we proceed, let’s run through security. Could you please confirm your reference number?
Thank you for that. Could you also confirm your email address and name so I can locate your order?
Sure, it’s emily.watson@example.com, and my name is Emily Watson.
Thank you, Emily. That’s all correct. Let me recap: your reference number is 65432-1098, your email is emily.watson@example.com, and your name is Emily Watson. Is that right?
Thank you. Let’s talk about what works for you. Could you describe what happened during the delivery and how the setup was left incomplete?

They seemed rushed and didn’t follow the instructions I gave about placing the sofa. They also left it in the hallway without assembling the legs. When I asked them to set it up properly, they said they didn’t have time and just walked out.

I’m so sorry to hear about this, Emily. That’s not the level of service we expect from our delivery team, and I completely understand your frustration. I’ll make sure this is escalated to the delivery management team for review and corrective action. Can you give me the approximate time of the delivery, and did the team leave any packaging materials behind?
They came around 11 am. No, they took the packaging, but that doesn’t make up for how unprofessional they were.

I completely agree, Emily. I’ve documented this incident and escalated it to the delivery management team. They’ll investigate this matter, and I’ll personally follow up to ensure you’re updated on the outcome. In the meantime, I’d like to offer a technician to come and assemble the sofa properly for you at no cost. Would that work for you?
Yes, that would help. I’m available on Friday afternoon.
Thank you, Emily. I’ve scheduled the technician for Friday afternoon, and you’ll receive a confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all. Thanks for handling this so quickly.
You’re very welcome, Emily. I’m truly sorry for your experience, and I appreciate your patience. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing SofaNest!
